src:
Trinkijeri: Ako mislite da ću ići sa pištoljem u svlačionicu - neću
„Bila je sramota od utakmice, ali ona ne sme obrisati sve druge stvari koje smo uradili“, poručuje Italijan

05 Nov 2019

Trener Partizana Andrea Trinkijeri svestan je da je njegova ekipa odigrala ispod svakog nivoa u večerašnjem meču sa Venecijom, ali navodi da ono što se večeras dešavalo ne sme da izbriše sve ono dobro što su crno-beli uradili u dosadašnjem toku sezone.
Italijan nije želeo previše da objašnjava razloge poraza, jer je kako kaže to znak da se ne radi pravi posao."Veliki italijanski fudbaler Đanluka Vijali je rekao: 'ko dobija raduje se, ko izgubi daje objašnjenja'. Bili smo loši u svim segmentima igre, od toga kako napraviti faulove do toga kako čitati utakmicu. Bila je sramota od utakmice, ali... Mislim da ovakva utakmica, koja je bila baš loša, ne sme obrisati sve druge stvari koje smo uradili. Ako smo pametni, mi ćemo shvatiti poruku, ako nismo, shvatićemo je malo teže, ali ćemo je shvatiti. Zadnji put smo u Areni igrali pre dva meseca. U ovakvim utakmicama ti se jednostavno desi sve. Izgledalo je kao da smo se sastali jutros i rekli - idemo na basket. Nisam ljut, već mi je žao... Ako mislite da ću ići sa pištoljem u svlačinicu - neću. Znamo da smo bili loši, znam da je bio dobar protivnik, ali znam kojim pravcem želimo da idemo dalje", poručuje Trinkijeri.
Ima li objašnjenja za ovakvo izdanje?"Ja imam objašnjenje, ali mislim da onaj koji daje puno objašnjenja nije napravio dobar posao. Imaćemo još ovakvih situacija, ali ćemo imati i utakmice sa Lokomotivnom, Limožom... Jer, mi nemamo vremena da treniramo i onda moramo svaki put nešto da izmislimo na utakmici. Danas nismo ništa uspeli da izmislimo", poručio je u svom stilu Trinkijeri.
Partizan je propustio priliku da overi plasman u TOP 16 fazu, ali je jasno da će to uskoro učiniti. Crno-beli naredni meč u Evrokupu igraju sa Tofašom 13. novembra.






Foto: MN press
text:
Trinkies: If you think I'll go with the gun to the locker room - I won't
"She was ashamed of the match, but she must not erase all the other things we did," says the Italian

05 Nov 2019

Partizan coach Andrea Trinkiere is aware that his team has played below every level in tonight's match with Venice, but states that what was happening tonight should not erase all the good that the black and whites have done so far this season.
The Italian did not want to explain too much the reasons for the defeat, because as the saying goes it is a sign that no real work is being done. "Great Italian footballer Gianluca Viali said: 'who wins rejoices, who loses gives explanations'. , from how to make fouls to how to read a game. It was a shame from the game, but ... I think a game like this, which was really bad, should not obliterate all the other things we did. If we are smart, we will understand the message, if not, we will understand it a little harder, but we will understand it. The last time we played in the Arena two months ago, in games like this you just happen everything. It looked like we met this morning and said - let's go to the basket. angry, I'm already sorry ... If you think I'll go with the gun to the locker room - I won't. We know we were bad, I know he was a good opponent, but I know which direction we want to go next, "Trinkieri said.
Any explanations for this release? "I have an explanation, but I think the one who gives a lot of explanations has not done a good job. We will have more situations like this, but we will also have matches with Locomotive, Limoges ... Because we don't have time to train and then we have to come up with something every time in the game. Today we have not been able to invent anything, "Trinkieri said in his style.
Partizan missed the opportunity to certify the placement in the TOP 16 phase, but it is clear that it will do so soon. Black and white next match at Eurocup play with Tofas on November 13th.






Photo: MN press
